result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a GraphQL client and defining request/response structures for fetching staked amounts of Ronin tokens by user address.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the GraphQL client and data models in separate files for better organization and maintainability.

internal/infras/indexer/client.go.purpose: This file implements a GraphQL client for fetching staked amounts of Ronin tokens by user address.

internal/infras/indexer/models.go.purpose: Defines GraphQL request and response structures for querying staked amounts by user address.
